channel.title: Makeover mage design player interface help
channel.description:
i was wondering how to change the text on this interface, i tryed looking in texthandler, player, and playerhandler, and client.java and i couldnt find how i can change the text, if you know how to change the text could you help me find it? i got devolution based 317 source.
the welcome to part is where i need some help
Picture: [URL=http://img163.imageshack.us/i/how.png/][IMG]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/2784/how.png[/img][/URL]
thanks bowzer,
